column1: As told from the viewpoint of DePelchin Childrens Center, a nonprofit community mental_health agency, this case study examines the connection between the Houston Independent School District and DePelchin that supplied an immediate, as well as long term, mental_health response to the trauma experienced by the families and individuals who fled Hurricanes Katrina and Rita.
